story.name: ANDYSMANCLUB - Coat of Arms
story.content: {"_uid":"44c004c8-1664-421f-85ce-8790427f98fb","body":[{"_uid":"bb97e346-3acb-45a2-8eb2-4e6aa551d09f","title":"","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"One of our attendees has very kindly designed a Coat of Arms for us - featuring a Tudor Rose, and two phrases in Latin that perfectly embody our group.","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"Omnia in hoc simul - which translates as \"All in this together\"","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"&","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"Suus Okay Loqui - which translates as \"It's Okay to Talk\"","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"Karl Jordan's heraldry work is available through his website, ","type":"text"},{"text":"here","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://jordanwkarl46.wixsite.com/heraldry-bespoke-art/home","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]},{"text":" and also his Facebook page, linked ","type":"text"},{"text":"here","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.facebook.com/HeraldryCOA","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"url"}}]},{"text":".","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"9457e529-a39a-4daf-8396-5e9d385a1b7b","items":["fdc0fc40-7d47-444d-8a77-7f183d0b6395","5e58f4ec-ec05-4672-9f97-b159fdce92cb","9bd1cc14-3c8d-4f68-8219-44d5e7ecda04"],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"","custom_title":"","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"0bb8de66-9dfc-4e41-9962-6a3ec45e2b80","title":"Luke's Lads – AMC Interviews Elliot Gorman | ANDYSMANCLUB","plugin":"meta-fields","description":"This week we had a chat with Elliot Gorman, Lead Facilitator of Luke’s Lads, a mental health and wellbeing project run by the charity, Timestep Community Dance, for men, women (butterflies), teenagers, young adults and new parents set up after 25-year old Luke Naylor sadly took his own life."},"component":"news_views","description":"","featured_image":{"id":5973563,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/1640x924/6816ae5ddb/andysmanclub-coat-of-arms-by-karl-jordan.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"}}
